page.title: 19Types of housing
page.content: We were interested to find out about the different types of houses in our area.We did a survey of the houses of children in our school. The most common type of house was the {semi-detached},but many people lived in{detached},{terraced}or{bungalows}. An interesting type of house peculiar to this area is the "{strawberry}" house. This is unusual because it has three windows on the upper floor and an arch over the front door.These houses have very large gardens,and were all built in about{1860}by the same builders.The people who lived in them were{strawberry growers}.The {strawberry industry}is the oldest industry of the{Locks Heath} area and a lot of strawberries are still grown here. Many{new estates}are now being built with a variety of{modern houses}.
